org.nd4j.jita.memory.impl

Class CudaFullCachingProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.jita.memory.impl.CudaDirectProvider
      • org.nd4j.jita.memory.impl.CudaCachingZeroProvider
        • org.nd4j.jita.memory.impl.CudaFullCachingProvider
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MemoryProvider

    public class CudaFullCachingProvider
extends CudaCachingZeroProvider
    This MemoryProvider implementation does caching for both host and device memory within predefined limits.
